meanings.definition: The ability to remember or bring to mind something previously learned or experienced.
meanings.sent1: Her recallability of the lyrics to the song was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The recallability of his childhood memories was remarkable.
meanings.sent3: His recallability of jokes always lightens the mood.
meanings.sent4: The recallability of that event is etched in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The recallability of the safety rules is crucial in emergencies.

meanings.definition: The quality of being easily remembered or brought to mind.
meanings.sent1: The recallability of her name made introductions easy.
meanings.sent2: The recallability of the logo helped in brand recognition.
meanings.sent3: The recallability of his jokes always brings a smile.
meanings.sent4: The recallability of that melody haunts me.
meanings.sent5: The recallability of the key points made studying simpler.
